All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, org.mt4j.components.css.util.CSSStylableComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets.keyboard.ITextInputListener, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.lassoProcessor.ILassoable, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
public class MTTextField
extends org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets.MTTextArea

The Class MTTextField. This is a modifed text area, that keeps a fixed size and ignores new lines ("\n"). So this is for single line of text with a fixed size no matter how long the actual text is.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
